@cometEmailId.description: Soil Metrics API email address or GGIT.com email address.
@cometEmailId.title: @cometEmailId

CRPEndYear.description: CRP end year. Must be YYYY.
CRPEndYear.title: CRPEndYear

CRPStartYear.description: CRP start year. Must be YYYY.
CRPStartYear.title: CRPStartYear

@CropNumber.description: Crop number for this crop event. Can have up to 3 crops for one crop year
@CropNumber.title: @CropNumber

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

ContinueFromPreviousYear.description:
Was this crop planted in the previous year.
Yes = continue crop growth for non-woody perennial crops
(like alfalfa, perennial grass hay or pasture) from
previous year without re-planting.
ContinueFromPreviousYear.title: ContinueFromPreviousYear

CropName.description: Name of crop. Check GGIT_API_File_Specification.xlsx tab CropName for complete list
CropName.title: CropName

GrazingEndDate.description: Grazing End date. Any date of the year. The system is sensitive to leap dates. Must be after the Grazing Start Date.
GrazingEndDate.title: GrazingEndDate

GrazingStartDate.description: Grazing Start date. Any date of the year. The system is sensitive to leap years
GrazingStartDate.title: GrazingStartDate

RestPeriod.description: Rest Period. Any number of days less than 365.
RestPeriod.title: RestPeriod

UtilizationPct.description: Utilization Percentage. Any percentage, in whole or real numbers, between 0 and 100.
UtilizationPct.title: UtilizationPct

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

HarvestDate.description: Harvest Date. must be in MM/DD/YYYY
HarvestDate.title: HarvestDate

yield.description: Yield amount. See crop type spec for yield units in GGIT_API_File_Specification.xlsx.
yield.title: yield

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T
Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

LimingDate.description: Liming date. must be in mm/dd/yyyy format
LimingDate.title: LimingDate

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

NApplicationAmount.description: Nitrogen application amount. Units in lbs N/acre
NApplicationAmount.title: NApplicationAmount

NApplicationDate.description: "Nitrogen application date. must be in MM/DD/YYYY
NApplicationDate.title: NApplicationDate

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T
List of manure application events. (Organic Amendment)

OMADAmount.description: Organic Amendment Amount units in tons dry matter per acre
OMADAmount.title: OMADAmount

OMADType.description: Organic Amendment Type. see GGIT_API_File_Specification.xlsx tab Organic Amendment Types for details
OMADType.title: OMADType

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

PlantingDate.description: Crop planting date. must be in MM/DD/YYYY format
PlantingDate.title: PlantingDate

Prune.description: Prune. Yes = woody perennial crops are pruned.
Prune.title: Prune

Renew.description:
Renew. Yes = remove and replant orchard. All coarse and fine branches
and all coarse roots are removed, soil is plowed, and new saplings
assumed to be 2 yrs old are planted.
Renew.title: Renew

TillageDate.description: Date this tillage event occurred. must be in MM/DD/YYYY.
TillageDate.title: TillageDate

anyOf.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

GEOM.description: Geometry, point or polygon. Polygon has maximum about of vertices, 1000.  Max size is 10,000 acres. SRID any

@AREA.description: Area of this geometry in acres.
@AREA.title: @AREA

GEOM.title: GEOM
